comments:
I was editing a WSDL file that contains this line.

	<xsd:import namespace="urn:hl7-org:v3"
		schemaLocation="processable/multicacheschemas/PRPA_IN201305UV.xsd" />
		
When I put the cursor inside the schemaLocation attribute value and pressed F3 to open the selection, I got a NullPointerException. This worked correctly in Eclipse 3.2 so it seems to be a regression bug. Here is an excerpt from the log.

Can you please clarify what version of WTP you are using? 

Is this something that happens consistently or just for certains files? If you can narrow down the scenario a small independent project with example files that demonstrates the issue is always appreciated.

I tried with a simple WSDL document importing a schema and it seems to work fine with both WTP 2.0 and 3.0. Please reopen with a reproducible scenario and more information about the version you are using.
Closing. Please reopen with more information if the issue reoccurs.
